name: NRS Kayak Rodeo Split Stern Flotation Bags
categories: Kayak Rodeo Split Stern Flotation Bags
description:
These short and narrow float bags are sized to slide easily on either side of the stern support pillar in modern freestyle kayaks.Made of 10-gauge urethane fabric that won't leak or delaminate.To ensure floodable spaces are completely filled, measure your boat’s compartments and use a bag that is slightly larger.Inflated dimensions are 71 x 23 (top) x 7.6cm (bottom) or 28 x 9 x 3in.Sold in pairs.

        Sustainability
